projects.name: Tellus
projects.tagline: A news aggregate site. World news: tailored to you
projects.info:
A news aggregate site for users to view world news from any country and any organization. Click on a country, read top stories, save articles, and follow your favorite countries and topics! You can even search for trending news topics.

The app uses Ruby on Rails, Devise, Javascript, jQuery, Mapbox, APIs, and Chat-GPT.

projects.name: To Infinity and Beyond
projects.tagline: An Airbnb-style website linking jetpack owners to renters.
projects.info:
An Airbnb-style website linking jetpack owners to renters. Find your dream jetpack, pick a date, and voila! Your next adventure awaits. You can leave reviews on jetpacks and add a jetpack yourself for others to rent! Warning: it is not advised to rent or use non-regulated jetpacks.

The app uses Ruby on Rails and Devise.
